name: Trickstar Trick
text:
Can be used if your opponent controls a monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck. Send 1 "Trickstar" monster to the Graveyard from the hand. The normal draw for the next opponent's turn after using this Skill becomes 3 cards, and at the end of that turn, banish random card(s) in the opponent's hand equal to the number of "Trickstar" cards in your Graveyard.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
